forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. Southeast wind 1 to 5 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 7am. Cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 37 overnight. West northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 45. West northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and patchy drizzle before 10am, then areas of fog and scattered rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 53, with temperatures falling to around 48 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew had a chance to test the system today with a nice shot of cold air.
